main event: A bright flash sighting was reported by the M/V Chena on October 29, 1961.
interesting points: The witness saw a single, bright white flash in a northerly direction,The flash was observed around the time of a potential atomic bomb test,The sighting lasted for a brief moment,Only one object was reported at the time of the flash,The observation conditions included a clear, dark sky with good visibility.
witness description: the Captain of the M/V Chena, reliability extremely good
